head.title: TeXML: an XML vocabulary for TeX

body.h1: TeXML: an XML vocabulary for TeX
body.p: TeXML is an XML vocabulary for TeX. A processor translates TeXML source into TeX.
The project is currently under development. It expected to be finished in the end of the March, 2004.

dl.dd: Alpha version of specification dated by 11 March 2004.
dl.dt: TeXML: Typesetting XML with TeX (PDF) by Douglas Lovell
dl.dd: This document describes the TeXML document format and the processor, TeXMLatté that produces TeX source from TeXML markup. The GetFO TeXML project reuses this specification.
